customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
After helping a ship get into the harbor, a navigator will generally be idle while waiting for the next task. As such, the sailors at port might invite the harbor staff for a meal and a drink, or perhaps to play some card games that all, young and old, are familiar with. These traditions have led to quite a few navigators becoming skilled players indeed...
<color=#ccbfad>Special Rule: You will not use your own deck, but a preset deck named "Boundless Consumption" instead.</color>
<color=#ffffffd9>Opposing Lineup</color>

customize.name: Lyney
customize.desc:
"Spectacle of Phantasmagoria" Lyney

Those flowers in the mirror... who are they for?

customize.name: Lynette
customize.desc:
"Elegance in the Shadows" Lynette

The firmament glimpsed in a reflected moon.

customize.name: Bennett
customize.desc:
"Trial by Fire" Bennett

Once you know that you will certainly lose, then you must certainly know the way to win.

customize.name: Guardian of Apep's Oasis
customize.desc:
Wisdom's End: Guardian of Apep's Oasis

Apep found itself swallowed alone amidst the scenery of the catastrophe. All the people, gods, dragons, beasts, birds, and fish. All memories, wisdom, words, and hatred were ground into colorless dust, and the last of the moonlight burned away into a rain of pale fire, falling on the barren land.

...

Apep once deemed the bottom of the sea of sand to be its grave, not the palace of a dispossessed king. The poison of "wisdom" would soon free Apep from the hatred and anger festering within it over countless moons. Apep had grown weary of the colorless apocalypse. Then, finally, the young god and the golden Traveler let it recall once again, even though the verdant land it once ruled had been reduced to this gilded wasteland, even though Apep and its many offspring had grown twisted and wretched to secure their continued survival therein, Apep still treasured the sight and scenes of the oasis sparkling in its heart.

customize.name: All-Devouring Narwhal
customize.desc:
Cryptic Creature: All-Devouring Narwhal

In the most fantastical of fables, or perhaps in the most rabid of ravings, the true stars in the depths of cosmos are just as full of life as on Teyvat, while the universe itself is akin to an ocean.

Perhaps the universe's infiltration of Teyvat has never ceased, and perhaps the drawing of borders around this world was the work of a higher will, meant to protect it.

customize.name: Xinyan
customize.desc:
"Blazing Riff" Xinyan

Time to rock!

customize.name: Timaeus
customize.desc:
Timaeus, Scholar of Alchemy

"Hello there… Oh, you'd like to use the Crafting Bench? Sure, be my guest."

customize.name: Timaeus

Timaeus, Scholar of Alchemy

"Hello there… Oh, you'd like to use the Crafting Bench? Sure, be my guest."

customize.name: Tubby
customize.desc:
"Rain Calmer" Tubby

"Steeping a pot of tea, watching over the abode, accompanying the Traveler and Paimon to await the arrival of Ping and the others, watching the cloud-filled sky. These days of not having to concern myself with matters of adeptal import truly are ones of leisure…"

"Oh! Oh dear, I must have fallen asleep again. It’s a good thing that no one noticed…"

customize.name: Kusava
customize.desc:
Kusava

Kusava, Kusava~♪

Memories and dreams are full of power.

It is the fruit of flowering plants, and also the seed of new life.

They are the temporary dwelling place of Aranara memories, and they give Aranara strength.

customize.name: In Every House a Stove
customize.desc:
In Every House a Stove

"The Stove God cared for the people, turning himself into minions who went into every home, fostering food and solidarity alike."

customize.name: Rainbow Macarons
customize.desc:
Rainbow Macarons

Small, multicolored little pastries. Their crispy outer shell packages a sweet, soft center, each refined to perfection.
There is a saying in Fontaine that "a dessert spread without macarons is like having the many waters bereft of their source."

customize.name: Lucky Coin
customize.desc: Currency verified and used by the Genius Invokation TCG Society. Can be used to purchase various items related to Genius Invokation TCG. It is said that these coins were initially named as such in the hopes that they would bring those carrying them luck. However, perhaps it is those who are sufficiently lucky who are able to possess them...
